Token.Abstract: Protocol for objects intending to be a delegate for an OAuth coordinator.

Parameter.Name: coordinator
Parameter.Abstract: The SFOAuthCoordinator instance processing this message

Parameter.Name: view
Parameter.Abstract: The WKWebView instance that will be used to conduct the authentication workflow

Token.Abstract: Sent when the web will starts to load its content.

Parameter.Name: coordinator
Parameter.Abstract: The SFOAuthCoordinator instance processing this message

Parameter.Name: view
Parameter.Abstract: The WKWebView instance that will be used to conduct the authentication workflow

Token.Abstract: Sent when the web will completed to load its content.

Parameter.Name: coordinator
Parameter.Abstract: The SFOAuthCoordinator instance processing this message

Parameter.Name: view
Parameter.Abstract: The WKWebView instance that will be used to conduct the authentication workflow

Parameter.Name: errorOrNil
Parameter.Abstract: Contains the error or nil if no error

Token.Abstract: Sent before oauthcoordinator will begin any kind of authentication

Parameter.Name: coordinator
Parameter.Abstract: The SFOAuthCoordinator instance processing this message

Parameter.Name: info
Parameter.Abstract: The SFOAuthInfo instance containing details about the type of authentication.

Parameter.Name: coordinator
Parameter.Abstract: The SFOAuthCoordinator instance processing this message.

Parameter.Name: info
Parameter.Abstract: Object containing info associated with this authentication attempt.

Token.Abstract: Sent if authentication fails due to an error.

Parameter.Name: coordinator
Parameter.Abstract: The SFOAuthCoordinator instance processing this message.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: The error associated with the failure.

Parameter.Name: info
Parameter.Abstract: Object containing info associated with the authentication attempt.

Token.Abstract: The delegate can implement this method to return a BOOL indicating whether the network is available.

Parameter.Name: coordinator
Parameter.Abstract: The SFOAuthCoordinator object to be queried (typically self).

Token.Abstract: Sent to notify the delegate that a browser authentication flow is about to begin.

Parameter.Name: coordinator
Parameter.Abstract: The SFOAuthCoordinator instance processing this message.

Parameter.Name: callbackBlock
Parameter.Abstract: A callback block used to notify the coordinator if it should continue with the authentication flow. Pass in YES to proceed, NO to cancel the authentication flow.

Token.Abstract: The delegate is expected to display an alert with the specific message and callback the completion block when the user dismisses the alert.

Parameter.Name: coordinator
Parameter.Abstract: The SFOAuthCoordinator instance

Parameter.Name: message
Parameter.Abstract: The message to display

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: The completion block to invoke

Token.Abstract: The delegate is expected to display a confirmation alert with the specific message and callback the completion block when the user dismisses the alert.

Parameter.Name: coordinator
Parameter.Abstract: The SFOAuthCoordinator instance

Parameter.Name: message
Parameter.Abstract: The message to display

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: The completion block to invoke with YES as result if the user confirmed the alert or NO if the user cancelled the alert.

Token.Abstract: Sent to notify the delegate that a authentication code was retrieved during idp flow.

Parameter.Name: coordinator
Parameter.Abstract: The SFOAuthCoordinator instance processing this message.

Token.Abstract: Sent after authentication has begun and the view parameter is displaying the first page of authentication content.

Parameter.Name: coordinator
Parameter.Abstract: The SFOAuthCoordinator instance processing this message

Parameter.Name: view
Parameter.Abstract: The WKWebView instance that will be used to conduct the authentication workflow

Token.Abstract: Sent after ASWebAuthenticationSession was initialized with authentication URL.

Parameter.Name: coordinator
Parameter.Abstract: The SFOAuthCoordinator instance processing this message

Parameter.Name: session
Parameter.Abstract: The ASWebAuthenticationSession instance that will be used to conduct the authentication workflow

Token.Abstract: Sent to notify the delegate that authentication via native REST APIs has begun.

Parameter.Name: coordinator
Parameter.Abstract: The SFOAuthCoordinator instance processing this message

Token.Abstract: Sent to notify the delegate that a browser authentication flow was cancelled out of by the user.

Parameter.Name: coordinator
Parameter.Abstract: The SFOAuthCoordinator instance processing this message.
